title: Expand Create Investment Form with E-Project, Payment Mode, Transaction IDs, and Payment Notice

requirements.text: In the InvestmentForm component, add an e-project dropdown field positioned immediately after the 'Description' field. Populate this dropdown with all secoinfi-apps options that are currently defined in the backend (the 38 options from the e-project list). The dropdown should be required and visible to all users, not just admins.

quotes: an e‑project dropdown populated with these exact options: [list all secoinfi‑apps]

acceptanceCriteria: E-project dropdown appears after Description field in InvestmentForm
Dropdown contains all 38 secoinfi-apps options
Field is visible to all users (admin and investor roles)
Field is required for form submission

requirements.text: Add a 'Mode' select dropdown in the InvestmentForm component after the e-project dropdown. This dropdown must contain exactly four options: 'GPay', 'Crypto', 'CBDC', and 'Wallets'. The field should be required and visible to all users.

quotes: a 'Mode' select with options GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets

acceptanceCriteria: Mode dropdown appears after e-project field
Dropdown contains exactly: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets
Field is required for form submission
Field is visible to all users

requirements.text: Add two transaction ID input fields in the InvestmentForm component after the Mode dropdown: (1) 'Txn ID (Nat)' as a required numeric input field accepting only natural numbers, and (2) 'Txn ID (String)' as an optional text input field. Both fields should be visible to all users.

quotes: an input for Txn ID as Nat, and an optional Txn ID as string

acceptanceCriteria: Txn ID (Nat) field accepts only numeric input
Txn ID (Nat) is required
Txn ID (String) field accepts text input
Txn ID (String) is optional
Both fields are visible to all users

requirements.text: Add a payment notice section in the InvestmentForm component after the transaction ID fields. Display the following information: UPI ID 'secoin@uboi', WhatsApp contact link 'https://wa.me/919620058644', and Ethereum address '0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7'. Format this as an informational notice box visible to all users.

quotes: the notice text about UPI secoin@uboi, WhatsApp link https://wa.me/919620058644, and Ethereum address 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7

acceptanceCriteria: Notice displays UPI ID: secoin@uboi
Notice includes clickable WhatsApp link to +91 96200 58644
Notice displays Ethereum address: 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7
Notice is styled as an informational box
Notice is visible to all users

requirements.text: Ensure the expanded InvestmentForm with all new fields (e-project dropdown, Mode select, transaction ID fields, and payment notice) is visible and accessible to all authenticated users in the Dashboard component, not just admins. Remove any admin-only restrictions on form visibility while maintaining the form's position in the existing Dashboard layout.

quotes: Form for its input to be submitted by the Users/ Investors/ Subscribers must be visible to All without any modification to each A/c mentioned by the Admin

acceptanceCriteria: InvestmentForm is visible on Dashboard for all authenticated users
No admin-only conditional rendering wraps the form
Form remains in its current position in the Dashboard
All new fields are accessible to investor and admin roles

requirements.text: Update the backend main.mo createInvestment function to accept and store the new fields from the expanded form: e-project selection (text), mode (text), transaction ID as Nat (numeric), and optional transaction ID as string. Ensure the Investment type includes these new fields.
acceptanceCriteria: Investment type includes eProject, mode, txnIdNat, and txnIdString fields
createInvestment function accepts these parameters
New fields are persisted to stable storage
Function validates required fields (eProject, mode, txnIdNat)

constraints: The InvestmentForm must remain in its current location within the Dashboard component
All new fields must be visible to both admin and investor roles
The e-project dropdown must use the exact secoinfi-apps list already defined in the system
The Mode dropdown must contain exactly four options: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets
The WhatsApp link must be: https://wa.me/919620058644
The UPI ID must be: secoin@uboi
nonGoals: Modifying the transaction form or transaction creation flow
Adding admin-specific controls to the expanded form
Changing the visual layout or position of the Dashboard
Implementing payment processing or verification logic
Adding validation for the Ethereum address or UPI ID format
